questions: Can you provide an overview of your experience in the Information Technology industry over the past 11.1 years?
How did you manage the employment gap of 1.5 years due to personal reasons and what did you learn from that experience?
What specific skills or expertise do you possess that sets you apart as a skilled professional in the IT industry?
Can you discuss a challenging project you worked on and how you overcame any obstacles to achieve success?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in the IT industry?
Have you had experience working in a team environment, and if so, how do you contribute to the team's success?
Can you provide examples of your experience with project management and how you ensure projects are completed on time and within budget?
How do you handle stressful situations or tight deadlines in the workplace?
What motivates you to continually improve and grow in your career within the IT industry?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively to ensure productivity in your role?
